title: Some tools you might need for STAT/DSCI class where R is needed for Homeworks
text: goal UBClassTools save students’ time encountering multiple choice questions STAT DSCI homework, schedule tight don’t really time read material figure answer, time try every combination choices (knows prof makes 7 choices tells one answer correct!) Just enter total number choices available, Hash code right answer (show error message randomly enter answer hoping correct.), tool output correct answer!

title: Some tools you might need for STAT/DSCI class where R is needed for Homeworks

title: Some tools you might need for STAT/DSCI class where R is needed for Homeworks
text: basic example shows solve common problem:
code: library(UBClassTools) ## basic example code getPermutations(2,"127a2ec00989b9f7faf671ed470be7f8") #> [1] "The answer is:" #> [1] "A" #> [1] "Function Complete!"

title: Title — getPermutations
text: num_choice number choices question answer_hash hash number right answer, shown screen get wrong first time.

title: Title — getPermutations
code: #example code getPermutations(6, "<test hash>") #> [1] "Function Complete!"  if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ getPermutations(2048) } # }
